label: Brooches and Pins
description: Jewelry items that can be attached to clothing or accessories using a pin or clasp.
intents: Find a brooch to match my outfit
Buy a pin as a gift
Learn about different types of brooches

subcategories.label: Poppy Brooches
subcategories.description: Brooches featuring the poppy flower, often worn to commemorate Remembrance Day.

subcategories.label: Animal Brooches
subcategories.description: Brooches featuring animals or animal-inspired designs.

subcategories.label: Flower Brooches
subcategories.description: Brooches featuring flowers or floral designs.

subcategories.label: Vintage Brooches
subcategories.description: Brooches with a vintage or antique aesthetic.
